channel.title: I Want To Learn Hard Shit
channel.description:
Well, i got the basics down, been coding for about 6 months now. There's Stuff i still don't know though. Like Wtf is a static int, i just wanna learn all this void shit and what it means, i've tryed that "java coding conventions but it brings me to this page with like 100 words, and no explanation.So if your good at coding(very good) help me with the following.
[ul][li]Static ints[/li] [li]Methods[/li] [li]Booleans[/li][/ul]
I know you barely know what i mean, but i just wanna figure out what they mean, and how i can learn to use them.ive spent too lnog coding and i can't even make stuff like a duel arena, the best i can do is a quest, ipban codes typed out, and the best thing i've ever done was make a clan chat.

Well, i got the basics down, been coding for about 6 months now. There’s Stuff i still don’t know though.
